title: Indian Ordnance Factory Recruitment 2017 | 382 Semi-Skilled/Apprentices
text: 03 Educational Qualifications : Are you seeking for Eligibility Criteria? If yes, then must have a look!!! Candidates who want to apply should have completed Diploma / Degree in Engineering or Technology or its equivalent qualification from a recognized University with good academic record. Check More: Graduate Jobs / Post Graduate Jobs Pay Scale : Aspirants who will be selected will get the attractive amount of Pay band of Rs. 4984/- (for Graduate Apprentice), Rs. 3542/- (for Technician Apprentice), Rs. 2758/- (for Technician (Vocational)) as decided by the selection committee of the organization. Mode of Assortment : Selection of the candidates will be based on the merit list. No Test or Interview will be conducted by the organization for recruitment of eligible candidates. How to apply for Indian Ordnance Factory Recruitment ? First and foremost step is to visit to the official website of the organization that is “gov.in”. Move the cursor to the “Job Opportunities” section which is available at the home page and open it. Now select “Join Us” link and hit on appropriate link for the post you want to apply for. Here is the advertisement, read the points carefully. Then candidates need to download the application form and take a print out of it. Fill the application form correctly in prescribed manner including all the details. Now attach all the Self-attested copies of Testimonials and Certificates along with the application form.
